name: Black Is White
description:
Black Is White is a text-based puzzle game / pc simulator or whatever, im not sure how to describe it.
As of 13.07.2018 i am uploading this due to a near deadline on the Gamejam https://itch.io/jam/elite-devs-game-jam . And since i have to rework my entire System for progressing and general Terminal command stuff which i barely added today, i decided to upload this version for now, since id rather have something online to show as a proof of concept, than nothing.
I will work on a fix for my super broken spaghetti system of progressing input and realease patches with more content soon, which means that a LOT of things will change lol. nothing will stay like it is right now. this was literally rushed in a few days, i want to get this right because i think this is actually an idea that i have lots of options with. (donations would keep me motivated i guess lol, but ill do it anyway haha)
I hope you enjoy this game.
- Toreole
